identity.name: NeonPub Karaoke
principles: Dark Mode Only: No light theme. We own the night.
Neon Accents: Use color to guide, not to decorate.
Touch-First: Big buttons for the mobile app (drunk-proof UI).
Broadcast Quality: The pub display must look like a TV show overlay.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-primary text-white font-bold hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(217,70,239,0.6)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: rounded-full border border-white/20 hover:bg-white/10 text-white transition-all
buttons.icon: p-3 rounded-full bg-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 hover:text-primary transition-colors

cards.song: rounded-xl bg-white/5 border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 hover:bg-white/10 transition-all cursor-pointer group

inputs.search: bg-white/5 border-none rounded-full px-6 py-4 text-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/50 placeholder:text-white/30

general: Implement Dark Mode by default. Do not create a light mode toggle.
Use 'Unbounded' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Ensure all interactive elements have a minimum touch target of 44px for mobile.
Use the 'glassmorphism' utility class defined in visual_enhancers for all overlays.
mobile_app: Focus on the 'Song Request' flow. It must be frictionless.
The 'Reaction' buttons (emojis) should float and burst when clicked.
Voting stars should be large and easy to tap.
admin_panel: Density is key here. The DJ needs to see the queue, current song, and controls at once.
Use high contrast borders for active states.
pub_display: This is a 'Lean Back' experience. Text must be huge.
The QR code must be always visible in the sidebar.
Use the 'ticker_zone' for messages like 'Next up: Sarah - Wonderwall'.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
